## Price series example

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

set.seed(42)
df <- tibble(
  time = seq.Date(Sys.Date()-29, Sys.Date(), by = "day"),
  price = cumsum(rnorm(30, 0.2, 1)) + 100,
  volume = round(runif(30, 100, 1000))
)

df <- df %>% mutate(return = c(NA, diff(log(price))))

ggplot(df, aes(time, price)) +
  geom_line(color = "#2c7fb8") +
  geom_point(size = 1, alpha = 0.8) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Synthetic price series", x = "Date", y = "Price")
```

## Save a figure (also written to outputs)

```{r, out.width="80%"}
# Save the PNG to the project-level outputs folder (one level up from notebooks/)
dir.create("../outputs/figures", recursive = TRUE, showWarnings = FALSE)
pngfile <- "../outputs/figures/presentation-price.png"
# save the last plot to file and embed the saved PNG into the slide
ggplot2::ggsave(pngfile, plot = last_plot(), width = 8, height = 4, device = "png")
knitr::include_graphics(pngfile)
```
